title: Construction of five storied building stage II for the Post Graduate Institute of Management (PIM), University of Sri Jayawardenapura
decision_details: - this is one of the leading institutes for Management Education in the University System of Sri Lanka which provides study courses and training in Management.  With the view to meet the emerging needs of the nation, it has been found necessary to expand the facilities available in this Institute.  Stage I of the project has already been completed.  The proposal made by Hon. S.B. Dissanayake, Minister of Higher Education, to construct the five storied building as Stage II of the project at a total cost of Rs.171 million, with funds generated by the Institute, was approved by the Cabinet.
